class tidypyspark.accessor_class.CachedAccessor(name, accessor)[source]

Custom property-like object (descriptor) for caching accessors.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The namespace this will be accessed under, e.g. df.foo

  • accessor (cls) – The class with the extension methods.

Note

Modified based on pandas.core.accessor.
